Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 259th overall pick, by Seattle in 2010...
Traded from Seattle to Detroit on 4/1/2010 (Going to DET: 3B C. Mauro. Going to SEA: 2B D. Marrufo)...
Injured on 6/14/2011 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/7/2011 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Detroit to Philadelphia on 3/2/2016 (Going to PHI: 1B C. Mauro. Going to DET: 2B M. Cuddyer)...
Had first career hit on 4/24/2017, off Ricky Ross (NYN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/25/2017, off Jordan Zimmerman (NYN)...
Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against St. Louis on 9/10/2017...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2018...
Injured on 8/12/2020 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 8/30/2021...
